title: Bangladesh removes Mujibur Rahman's 'freedom fighter' status in new ordinance after removing him from currency
description: Bangladesh removes Mujibur Rahman's 'freedom fighter' status in new ordinance after removing him from currency The new oridinance states leaders such as Sheikh Mujibur Rahman will not be called "freedom fighters", instead they will now be classified as “associates of the Liberation War” (Muktijuddhe...

title: Hindu, Buddhist temples replace Mujib image on new Bangladesh currency notes
description: Bangladesh has started to issue new banknotes from Sunday, June 1, with the new currency notes not feature the portrait of former prime minister and founding father - Sheikh Mujibur Rahman anymore. title: Bad news for Dhaka: India shuts land route for Bangladesh jute in latest strike against 'unfair trade practices'
description:
India has imposed immediate restrictions on the import of jute and allied fibre products from Bangladesh, limiting entry to only one port — Nhava Sheva in Maharashtra — in a move aimed at curbing unfair trade practices and protecting the domestic jute industry.
